function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of green features in the home environment may lead to a decline in psychological health during COVID-19 lockdown.","Impact":"Increased risk of psychological health decline in the general population during the COVID-19 lockdown.","Mitigation":"Promoting the use of nature-based elements inside the home environment to mitigate the decline in psychological health.","Technologies":"Nature-based design elements, indoor plants, green walls, etc.","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health organizations, interior designers, homeowners"},{"Description":"Limited access to public green spaces during the COVID-19 pandemic may impact psychological health.","Impact":"Increased risk of psychological health decline due to limited access to public green spaces during the COVID-19 pandemic.","Mitigation":"Encouraging the use of nature-based elements within the home environment to compensate for the limited access to public green spaces.","Technologies":"Indoor plants, green decor, nature-based design elements.","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health organizations, urban planners, homeowners"},{"Description":"Inadequate interaction with green elements in the workplace may affect psychological health, especially for non-smart workers.","Impact":"Potential decline in psychological health for non-smart workers due to inadequate exposure to green elements in the workplace.","Mitigation":"Promotion of green features in the workplace and encouraging non-smart workers to incorporate green elements in their home environment.","Technologies":"Green workplace design, indoor plants, natural light integration.","People":"Non-smart workers","Owner":"Employers, interior designers"}]}
